title: Super Bowl Guardians of the Galaxy Trailer Takes out One of Its Heroes | Vanity Fair
text: Super Bowl Guardians of the Galaxy Trailer Takes out One of Its Heroes And introduces the movie’s glamorous, gold supervillain. by Twitter If we know anything about the Guardians of the Galaxy franchise at this point, it’s that director James Gunn loves subverting expectations. So it should come as no surprise that the classic hero shot at the end of the film’s new Super Bowl trailer would end with a little twist. Pom Klementieff ’s Mantis—the latest addition to the team—gets taken out unceremoniously by a fire ball. The trailer also revealed the film’s main villain—a gold-drenched figure played by Elizabeth Debicki . The character goes by Ayesha in the film but comics fans might be more familiar with more ominous names like “Paragon” or simply “Her.” Debicki makes a memorable entrance into the franchise with the phrase, “Just who the hell do you think you are?” Though Debicki’s character is the obvious villain of the film, there’s a chance that Kurt Russell ’s character, Ego, also has less than pure intentions. What else would you expect from Star Lord’s dad? But once a villain is not always a villain. After all, Yondu ( Michael Rooker ) spent the first film threatening Star Lord’s life—but is now comfortably ensconced as part of the rag tag hero team. Share
